about_the_game:
Second Shift is a first-person psychological horror and mystery game that offers a rich, immersive story. Step into the surreal experiences of Adam, the main character, and unravel the eerie events that blur the lines between reality and nightmare.

As you explore Adam's terrifying past and present, you'll delve deeper into his mind, questioning the nature of his reality. The game's core mechanic, a pocket watch, provides unique experiences and aids in solving intricate puzzles throughout your journey.

Features:
Deep Story and Rich Atmosphere: Discover Adam's complex and surreal tale. Question the truth behind his experiences as you remain on edge at every turn.

Varied Environments: From eerie mines to abandoned houses, traverse a range of meticulously designed locations that heighten the sense of dread.

First-Person Experience: The first-person perspective places you directly into the heart of the horror, offering an intense and immersive experience.

Puzzles and Mysteries: Solve challenging puzzles that test your wits and keep you constantly engaged and thinking.

Threatening Enemies: Face numerous sinister entities haunting Adam. Confront your fears and fight to survive against relentless foes.

Second Shift captivates with its atmospheric horror and compelling narrative, leaving a lasting impression on those brave enough to face its challenges. Witness Adam's story and muster all your courage to survive this harrowing journey. How far will you go in the boundary between reality and illusion?

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains significant amounts of blood and gore. It also explores a psychological disorder, providing a deep and immersive experience that delves into complex mental health themes. Players will encounter strong language and profanity throughout the game. The game features intense violence, including dismembered body parts, but there are no sexual content or themes. This mature content is integral to the game's narrative and atmosphere, and we aim to deliver a thought-provoking and intense experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
